body_html: I have been converting from keras to pytorch. Everything similar on GPU but on CPUs pytorch is really slow - 10 times slower with my predictions expected to take 10+ hours versus 1 hour on keras. I have compiled pytorch and installed mkldnn. No difference.

body: I have been converting from keras to pytorch. Everything similar on GPU but on CPUs pytorch is really slow - 10 times slower with my predictions expected to take 10+ hours versus 1 hour on keras. I have compiled pytorch and installed mkldnn. No difference.
